62.ara-name: كتاب فضائل أصحاب النبى صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Masruq:`Abdullah (bin Mas`ud) was mentioned before `Abdullah bin `Amr. The latter said, "That is a man I continue to love because I heard Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) saying, ' Learn the recitation of the Qur'an from (any of these) four persons: `Abdullah bin Masud, Salim the freed slave of Abu Hudhaifa, Ubai bin Ka`b, and Mu`adh bin Jabal." I do not remember whether he mentioned Ubai first or Mu`adh

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنَاقِبُ سَالِمٍ مَوْلَى أَبِي حُذَيْفَةَ رضى الله عنه
chapter.eng-name: The merits of Salim, the freed slave of Abu Hudhaifa رضي الله عنه
